amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the National Telecommunications and Information Administration grants program by $10 million and reduce Federal Prison System funding accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds appropriated in the bill for Information Infrasture grants by $10 million and to reduce funds appropriated for construction of correction facilities comensurately.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A028) Failed by voice vote.
